109: // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
110: // Operation on *lhs, rhs using "compare_and_store" routine
111: //     TYPE    - operands' type
112: //     BITS    - size in bits, used to distinguish low level calls
113: //     OP      - operator
114: // Note: temp_val introduced in order to force the compiler to read
115: //       *lhs only once (w/o it the compiler reads *lhs twice)
116: #define OP_UPDATE_CMPXCHG_CPT(TYPE, BITS, OP)                                  \
117:   {                                                                            \
118:     TYPE KMP_ATOMIC_VOLATILE temp_val;                                         \
119:     TYPE old_value, new_value;                                                 \
120:     temp_val = *lhs;                                                           \
121:     old_value = temp_val;                                                      \
122:     new_value = (TYPE)(old_value OP rhs);                                      \
123:     while (!KMP_COMPARE_AND_STORE_ACQ##BITS(                                   \
124:         (kmp_int##BITS *)lhs, *VOLATILE_CAST(kmp_int##BITS *) & old_value,     \
125:         *VOLATILE_CAST(kmp_int##BITS *) & new_value)) {                        \
126:       temp_val = *lhs;                                                         \
127:       old_value = temp_val;                                                    \
128:       new_value = (TYPE)(old_value OP rhs);                                    \
129:     }                                                                          \
130:     *lhs = new_value;                                                          \
131:     return new_value;                                                          \
132:   }
